The model is served using FastAPI with interactive Swagger documentation.


ðŸ“Œ Features Used for Prediction
The model predicts car prices using the following input features:
1- Year â€“ Manufacturing year
2- Present_Price â€“ Current showroom price (in lakhs)
3- Kms_Driven â€“ Total kilometers driven
4- uel_Type â€“ Type of fuel used
5- Seller_Type â€“ Dealer or Individual seller
6- Transmission â€“ Manual or Automatic
7- Owner â€“ Number of previous owners
